title: Duke Nukem Forever playthrough -- Part 1
description: Finally playing the infamous Duke Nukem Forever for the first time. So far it's kind of what I expected. Extremely linear and simple like a CoD campaign with some silly shit mixed in. Duke spouts old memes constantly but I like the interaction with the world, even if it's a bit overboard. The guns are pretty fun, but I can't help but feel like the fights are kind of boring.
